original_title: In the Land of the Free...
overview: Tells the shocking and unbelievable story of Herman Wallace, Albert Woodfox and Robert King, three black men from rural Louisiana who were held in solitary confinement in the biggest prison in the U.S., an 18,000-acre former slave plantation known as Angola.
tagline: See this film because they can't.
title: In the Land of the Free...
